title: Has anyone, ever, so far in Season 6, gotten their first pref in Ranked? Is it actually possible?
body: Has anyone lived to tell the tale?

replies.body: I have literally never got my role. So I'm now a support main and not by choice cause every other fcking role is taken
Don't put your second as fill then.
It's either fill  or second pref. Same shit.

No it isn't. Not at all. 

Fill = Support. Unless your main pick is Support.

So don't pick fill unless you plan on supporting. 

You should probably learn a second role or pick your second best role always never put fill in unless you expect to Support. Otherwise you are just showing how silly you are as a person.
Oh you're one of those literal people that take everything seriously. I'll let you think you're clever.
About 80% of the time yes.  Unless I put second as fill. The just always gets me support.

God i hate people who put fill and then in champ select ask to swap with people. JUST DONT PUT FILL ON THEN IDIOT. "But i want faster Que" don't freakin put it as fill if you can't freakin support god damn it!

A majority of my games I get my first pref (bot) - but I tend to play with +1 or +2 friendos.

I put Bot/Mid.

I think bot is like the second least picked main out of all picked roles though. I would love to see the real numbers/stats on it but how i see it, it goes : Mid>Top>Jungle>Bot>Support. When ever i pick bot first and any other role but support, i get Bot 95% of the time. When i pick jungle and top/mid, i get jungle all the time. And so on. 

It sucks though as i am a Mid main and i do so damn good at mid. But i have been fine with just sticking to Bot lane as when i don't go it our ADC tends to fail hard unless the support is a god/goddess.
I used to go Mid/Supp and ALWAYS got Supp. Now I put Mid/Jungle and get Jungle about 80% of the time

For me i find mid is the HARDEST lane to get OCE wise. 

For a long time i went Mid/Jungle and would always get jungle. Then i tried Mid/Bot. Again i got Bot. Then i tried Mid/Top and i got mid a LOT more. 

Now im sticking to Bot/Jungle as in bronze i do a hell of a lot better in those roles than the others even though i am a Mid player through and through.

EVERY SINGLE GAME SO LUCKY, always get the lane I want.

or maybe thats just cause click I fill.........................{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Always, when i pref support

:^)

Yes.

And also fill = 99.9% support
I put down first pick as support so yeah 99% of the time, and the one time I actually got mid, the support wanted to trade so I said yes of course aha~
all the time but i always pick top and mid{{item:3027}}

Almost all the time (i am supp/adc main tho).
I always get mid when I play with my friends
if i didnt get Pref role i just go soraka
every time
many times. . like so often i barely register how often it is.
yeah about 30% of my games i get what i want, system is fucked gg
Yes twice in 46 games! Feelsgoodman
Yeah i have. The one time i picked mid pref i got it. Then the rest is usually a juggle between top and jungle.
